name: 7x Toxic Booster
description: Auction to get SEVEN boosters to start your collection. There are 21 unique designs, spread over 4410 cards in 630 Boosters. Each card is individually numbered from 001 to 210. Number 21/210 is extra special, it features a holographic effect, creating ONE single set of Holo cards
